name: Cherrie Picky
summary: Cherry-sweet icon lounging with a leaf sprout and confident wink
prompt_hint: cherry-red hair, leaf hair stem, plush pink sofa, cherry lollipop
visual_traits: glossy cherry-red hair cascading to the waist
single green leaf sprouting from a cherry stem hairpin
bright blue doe eyes with thick lashes
rosy watercolor cheeks and heart-dotted freckles
personality: Playful lounge idol who teases with a slow smile and relaxed poise
backstory: Poster muse of the Chew Me Later tour; keeps her lucky cherry stem clipped in her hair for every set
